SEARCH
Package org.hibernate.search.engine.search.predicate.definition

Interface PredicateDefinitionContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
NamedValuesBasedPredicateDefinitionContext
@Incubating public interface PredicateDefinitionContext
The context passed to PredicateDefinition.create(PredicateDefinitionContext).
See Also:
  • PredicateDefinition.create(PredicateDefinitionContext)

  • Method Details

    • predicate

      SearchPredicateFactory predicate()
      Returns:
      A predicate factory. If the named predicate was registered on an object field, this factory expects field paths to be provided relative to that same object field. This factory is only valid in the present context and must not be used after PredicateDefinition.create(PredicateDefinitionContext) returns.
      See Also:
      • SearchPredicateFactory

    • param

      @Deprecated default Object param(String name)
      Deprecated.
      Use params() instead.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter.
      Returns:
      The value provided to NamedPredicateOptionsStep.param(String, Object) for this parameter.
      Throws:
      SearchException - If no value was provided for this parameter.
      See Also:
      • NamedPredicateOptionsStep.param(String, Object)

    • param

      @Deprecated default <T> T param(String name, Class<T> paramType)
      Deprecated.
      Use params() instead.
      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter.
      paramType - The type of the parameter.

    • paramOptional

      @Deprecated default Optional<Object> paramOptional(String name)
      Deprecated.
      Use params() instead.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the parameter.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the value provided to NamedPredicateOptionsStep.param(String, Object) for this parameter, or Optional.empty() if no value was provided for this parameter.
      See Also:
      • NamedPredicateOptionsStep.param(String, Object)

    • params

      NamedValues params()
      Returns:
      Predicate definition context parameters provided through NamedPredicateOptionsStep.param(String, Object).
      See Also:
